ygData.subject: Re: question - articles concerning NEAT/HyperNEAT and activation function evolution
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Marcin, We just got a paper accepted to GECCO this year about this topic. We compared using NEAT with uniform (homogeneous) activation in all neurons to
